name: Super Mario Land 2 GMS2 recreation (WIP)
description:
I hope you like this demo i've made! This is a project im making for experimenting in gms2 and maybe ill make it a full fangame, i hope you like it as good as me

CREDITS

-Thewolfbunny: number font + hud

-Mister Man + snessy the duck: Mario sprites

-A.J. NITRO: Enemies + Map sprite

-Ragey: Star + some blocks sprites

-Raccoon: some of the tiles sprites

-Nintendo: the og game itself
